sense.def:
To have trouble doing something
pomeni, da ima nekdo težave pri izvajanju nečesa.

seg.quote: You shouldn't have any trouble locating them.
This would save everyone a lot of trouble.

sense.def:
Kadar je en vidik okoliščin
the trouble
, povzroča težave ali je vzrok, da je celotni položaj nezadovoljiv.

seg.quote: It's getting a bit expensive now, that's the trouble.
The trouble with you is that you've forgotten what it's like to be young.

sense.def:
One's troubles
je isto kot
one's problems
.

seg.quote: She thought that all her troubles were over.

sense.def:
Trouble
je to, da je nekaj narobe z našim telesom. Na primer,
to have back trouble
pomeni imeti težave s hrbtom.

Beseda
trouble
pomeni, da se ljudje prepirajo ali pretepajo.

seg.quote: He's the sort of person who always makes trouble.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
troubles someone
, je vzrok, da je nekdo zaskrbljen.

seg.quote: It was a new and troubling thought.

sense.def:
Kdor je
in trouble
, ima resne težave.

seg.quote: Frank was still in deep financial trouble.

sense.def:
Kdor je
in trouble
, je prekršil pravilo ali zakon in bo zato verjetno kaznovan.

seg.quote: ...if a child is in trouble with the police.
I don't want to get you into trouble.

sense.def:
To take the trouble to do something
pomeni narediti nekaj, čeprav to zahteva nekaj časa in truda.
